moonfix.gui.config.title: Moonfix Config
moonfix.config.sign_text.tooltip: Toggle the limitation of sign text length
moonfix.config.sign_text_render.tooltip: Toggle the limit of the text rendered by the signs
moonfix.config.sign_edit.tooltip: "Use" sign with an empty hand to edit it
moonfix.config.sign_scale.tooltip: Scales the model of signs to fit the text width
moonfix.config.structure_void.tooltip: Toggles the marker block for Structure Void
moonfix.config.tripwire.tooltip: Toggles the marker block for Tripwire
moonfix.config.stripped_logs.tooltip: Blocks axes from stripping logs, unless if sneak key is pressed
moonfix.config.dirt_path.tooltip: Blocks shovels from creating dirt paths, unless if sneak key is pressed
moonfix.config.fire_overlay.tooltip: Disables the fire overlay when you have fire protection
moonfix.config.soul_fire.tooltip: Uses the soul fire texture for fire overlay ONLY when you stand in a soul fire block
moonfix.config.highlight.tooltip: Allows player highlighting on selected gamemode (cheaty)
moonfix.config.highlight_entity.tooltip: Switches the type of entity to be targeted on Player Highlight (extremely cheaty)
moonfix.config.love_particles.tooltip: Animals in breeding state produce heart particles (MC-93826)
moonfix.config.third_person_crosshair.to: Enables the crosshair while in third person perspective
moonfix.config.debug_info.tooltip: Completely ignores the server gamerule, reducedDebugInfo
